channel.title: Can't Start Clients
channel.description:
Ok, well this may sound really dumb, but I am unable to start the client. I'm 100% sure that my paths are right, I have this problem with all clients. I have the newest version of Java and JDK. I am running on Windows Vista.
Ok, so here's what happens.
For some reason my computer does not recognize .bat files as running with the command prompt. So, when I double click the run.bat file, it asks me what I would like to open the file with. [IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/2923/openwithpm9.jpg[/img]
When I choose the command prompt, a blank command prompt just pops up and nothing is executed. [IMG]http://img61.imageshack.us/img61/6606/commandwk1.jpg[/img]
So, in order to run the .bat file, I open the command prompt and type in the exact location of the run.bat, but all I get is "The system cannot find the path specified." [IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/6758/command1ul9.jpg[/img]
So, any help on this situation would be greatly appreciated. I posted the pictures because whenever I would ask about this, I would just get the response: "Are you sure you did this part right?"
Again, sorry if this is a stupid question and I'm just an idiot.
I get this problem for every client I run.
Thanks in advance, Get Ic3d

item.title: Can't Start Clients
item.dc:creator: @Get_Ic3d Get Ic3d
item.description:
@Get_Ic3d wrote:

Ok, well this may sound really dumb, but I am unable to start the client. I’m 100% sure that my paths are right, I have this problem with all clients. I have the newest version of Java and JDK. I am running on Windows Vista.

Ok, so here’s what happens.

For some reason my computer does not recognize .bat files as running with the command prompt. So, when I double click the run.bat file, it asks me what I would like to open the file with.

When I choose the command prompt, a blank command prompt just pops up and nothing is executed.

So, in order to run the .bat file, I open the command prompt and type in the exact location of the run.bat, but all I get is “The system cannot find the path specified.”

So, any help on this situation would be greatly appreciated. I posted the pictures because whenever I would ask about this, I would just get the response: “Are you sure you did this part right?”

Again, sorry if this is a stupid question and I’m just an idiot.

I get this problem for every client I run.

Thanks in advance,
Get Ic3d
